name: Home Screen Sections
description: A Jellyfin plugin which allows users to update their web client's home screen to be a bit more dynamic and more "Netflixy".
overview: Update your home screen to be more dynamic with custom sections like 'Because You Watched', 'Discover', and more.

versions.changelog: Update for Jellyfin 10.11.5 compatibility. Added robust Jellyseerr integration.
